title: This should be a standard feature - XGIMI MoGo Pro
description: Thanks to XGIMI for sponsoring this video! Check out the XGIMI MoGo Pro, a sleek portable Android TV projector, great for games and movies. Use code OKEEAZCS for 10% off through Amazon at   Or use code XGIMILINUS and get 10% off at    Amazon US:  Amazon EU:  Amazon Halo:   Both above coupon codes are valid until June 21st, 2020!  Portable battery-powered projectors aren't exactly new, but this little projector had something interesting up its sleeve!  Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
